titlestmt.titleproper: Records Relating to the Construction of the Agriculture Building at The University of Arizona (Tucson, Ariz.) 1913-1915
Records Relating to the Construction of the Agriculture Building at The University of Arizona (Tucson, Ariz.)

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records Relating to the Construction of the Agriculture Building at The University of Arizona (Tucson, Ariz.) 1913-1915
did.abstract: Includes correspondence with architects, contractors, Board of Regents, State officials; monthly reports submitted by Robert H. Forbes; and some financial records

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records Relating to the Construction of the Agriculture Building at The University of Arizona (Tucson, Ariz.) (AZ 445). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Dean Emeritus of the College of Agriculture. The Agriculture Building was renamed the Robert H. Forbes Building in 1985.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with architects, contractors, Board of Regents, State officials; monthly reports submitted by Robert H. Forbes; and some financial records.

item.corpname: University of Arizona -- College of Agriculture -- History.
